org.fax4j.spi
Class AbstractFaxJobMonitor

java.lang.Object
  org.fax4j.spi.AbstractFaxJobMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
FaxJobMonitor
Direct Known Subclasses:
FaxJobMonitorImpl
public abstract class AbstractFaxJobMonitor
extends Object
implements FaxJobMonitor

This class provides partial implementation of the fax job monitor capabilities.

Since:
0.40.2
Version:
1.02
Author:
Sagie Gur-Ari

stopMonitoringAllFaxJobs

public void stopMonitoringAllFaxJobs(FaxClientSpi faxClientSpi)
This function will stop the monitoring of all fax jobs registered by the provided fax client SPI.
Other fax jobs registered by other SPIs will keep on being monitored.

Specified by:
stopMonitoringAllFaxJobs in interface FaxJobMonitor
